00037 #ifndef EGS_ISOTROPIC_SOURCE_

00068 
00097 class EGS_ISOTROPIC_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_IsotropicSource :
00098     public EGS_BaseSimpleSource {
00099 
00100 public:
00101 
00103     enum GeometryConfinement {
00104         IncludeAll      = 0,
00105         ExcludeAll      = 1,
00106         IncludeSelected = 2,
00107         ExcludeSelected = 3
00108     };
00109 
00115     EGS_IsotropicSource(int Q, EGS_BaseSpectrum *Spec, EGS_BaseShape *Shape,
00116                         EGS_BaseGeometry *geometry,
00117                         const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00118         EGS_BaseSimpleSource(Q,Spec,Name,f), shape(Shape),
00119         min_theta(85.), max_theta(95.), min_phi(0), max_phi(2*M_PI),
00120         buf_1(1), buf_2(-1),
00121         geom(geometry), regions(0), nrs(0), gc(IncludeAll) {
00122         setUp();
00123     };
00124 
00129     EGS_IsotropicSource(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00130     ~EGS_IsotropicSource() {
00131         egsWarning("destructing point source\n");
00132         EGS_Object::deleteObject(shape);
00133         if (geom) {
00134             if (!geom->deref()) {
00135                 delete geom;
00136             }
00137         }
00138         if (nrs > 0 && regions) {
00139             delete [] regions;
00140         }
00141     };
00142 
00143     void getPositionDirection(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00144                               EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &wt) {
00145         bool ok = true;
00146         do {
00147             x = shape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00148             if (geom) {
00149                 if (gc == IncludeAll) {
00150                     ok = geom->isInside(x);
00151                 }
00152                 else if (gc == ExcludeAll) {
00153                     ok = !geom->isInside(x);
00154                 }
00155                 else if (gc == IncludeSelected) {
00156                     ok = false;
00157                     int ireg = geom->isWhere(x);
00158                     for (int j=0; j<nrs; ++j) {
00159                         if (ireg == regions[j]) {
00160                             ok = true;
00161                             break;
00162                         }
00163                     }
00164                 }
00165                 else {
00166                     ok = true;
00167                     int ireg = geom->isWhere(x);
00168                     for (int j=0; j<nrs; ++j) {
00169                         if (ireg == regions[j]) {
00170                             ok = false;
00171                             break;
00172                         }
00173                     }
00174                 }
00175             }
00176         }
00177         while (!ok);
00178 
00179         u.z = rndm->getUniform()*(buf_1 - buf_2) - buf_1;
00180 
00181         //u.z = 2*rndm->getUniform()-1;
00182         EGS_Float sinz = 1-u.z*u.z;
00183         if (sinz > 1e-15) {
00184             sinz = sqrt(sinz);
00185             EGS_Float cphi, sphi;
00186             //rndm->getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00187             // sample phi, slower than rndm->getAzimuth
00188             EGS_Float phi = min_phi +(max_phi - min_phi)*rndm->getUniform();
00189             cphi = cos(phi);
00190             sphi = sin(phi);
00191             u.x = sinz*cphi;
00192             u.y = sinz*sphi;
00193         }
00194         else {
00195             u.x = 0;
00196             u.y = 0;
00197         }
00198         wt = 1;
00199     };
00200 
00201     EGS_Float getFluence() const {
00202         return count;
00203     };
00204 
00205     bool storeFluenceState(ostream &) const {
00206         return true;
00207     };
00208 
00209     bool setFluenceState(istream &) {
00210         return true;
00211     };
00212 
00213     bool isValid() const {
00214         return (s != 0 && shape != 0);
00215     };
00216 
00217 protected:
00218 
00219     EGS_BaseShape *shape;  
00220     EGS_BaseGeometry *geom;
00221     int              *regions;
00222 
00223     void setUp();
00224 
00225     EGS_Float min_theta, max_theta;
00226     EGS_Float buf_1, buf_2; 
00227     EGS_Float min_phi, max_phi;
00228     int                 nrs;
00229     GeometryConfinement gc;
00230 };
00231 
00232 // change log:
00233 // Long, Jan 15 2008 add polar angle limitation and macro support
00234 //                  a word on the polar angle sampling:
00235 //                        cos(theta) follows a uniform distribution
